Epic Games Store distributes Ruiner and Nuclear Throne shooters
07 Nov 2019, 17:10 by Daria Gromova
Cyberpunk and post-apocalypse with a benefit of 708 rubles.
In the Epic Games Store, two atypical shooters became temporarily free at once: the ruthless cyberpunk Ruiner and the post-apocalyptic roguelike Nuclear Throne.



The action of Ruiner takes place in 2091. As in many cyberpunk films, the system is rotten through and through, and the hero (an improved psychopath) is ready to destroy it in order to discover the truth about the world and save his missing brother. Fans of the genre will appreciate the brutal and thoughtful combat system.



Nuclear Throne is a reckless roguelike in a world that has survived the apocalypse and is populated by mutants and monsters. As in many other similar games, radiation plays an important role. She should not be afraid, but collected so that the character mutates and becomes stronger, acquiring new limbs and abilities. The game is available for both Windows and macOS.
Usually Ruiner costs 419 rubles, and Nuclear Throne - 289 rubles. Distribution will last until November 14. After that, the action platform game The Messenger will become free.
